name: Wardrobe
description: Family of 4 are staying in a rental flat and urgently requires a wardrobe. The current one is in bad condition and might collapse any moment. In fact, one of the wardrobe doors came off yesterday and hit the floor with a loud bang. Luckily my client’s 2 young daughters (aged 4 and 1 years old respectively) were not playing with their toys in front of the wardrobe when the door came off. Besides my client (who is a single mother) and her 2 young daughters, her 80 years old frail and elderly grandmother is also staying with her. The damaged and “anytime can collapse” wardrobe poses a danger to her 2 very young children and her frail and elderly grandmother. In view of the above, she needs the kind assistance of kind PassITOn donors / sponsors so that she can secure a new wardrobe within a short period of time.  Sorry for the long appeal message and await your positive reply on helping my client family.Thanks! Regards Mr Ho (9722 2721)

name: Dehumidifier
description: Family of 5 living in a rental flat, including parents, a 5-year-old and a pair 4-year-old twins. Father is the sole breadwinner, while mother is a homemaker. The twins were born premature, leading to weaker immune systems. Father suffers from eczema, while mother has a back injury which prevents her from working. The family is experiencing mould issues in their rental home, which have exacerbated their health problems, particularly the children’s, including frequent high fevers, rashes, eczema, and many hospital visits. Mother has tried to clean the home regularly, air the home, and use an air purifier, but it does not seem to be helping. They are hoping for a dehumidifier to help alleviate the mould and mildew issues.
